page.title: Basilisk Title
page.t: The Basilisk is an Argon heavy destroyer, designed as a heavy patrol and counter attack capital ship. It exceeds the Behemoth in every aspect and it´s newly developed main battery is much more capabale then its predecessor on the Behemoth./n/nThe Basilisk is a typical Argon design and a well balanced ship.

The Argon Basilisk main battery is a capital ship weapon, specially designed for the Basilisk. It can basically be described as a plasma accelerator cannon.\n\nLike the Basilisk, it´s a newer design and was designed to fight Xenon fortifications. Due to the heavily accelerated projectiles, it has a higher range and deals massive damage to any unshielded targets.
